plot: Rob befriends a stranger during a business trip. When Rob unknowingly finds himself to be the target of a dangerous man, his new friend comes to his rescue.
title: Hired Guns
plot_es: Rob befriends a stranger during a business trip. When Rob unknowingly finds himself to be the target of a dangerous man, his new friend comes to his rescue.
plot_en: Rob befriends a stranger during a business trip. When Rob unknowingly finds himself to be the target of a dangerous man, his new friend comes to his rescue.
